name: Devotion (itch) (RandyLarson)
description:
Devotion There is no absence of love and caring. You must be worthy to receive it. Is your devotion pure enough? Is your well of strength and determination deep enough? Demonstrate your devotion. Build monuments toward the all-highest. Premise You will be tasked with building monuments to a certain height in order to advance. You must build within an allotted time. Consequences will result that shorten the game if time lapses. Build on the central pad below the all seeing all-highest. Game controls Select a villager by doing any of these
  • Left Click on a villager
  • [TAB] key to select next villager
  • [SHIFT] + [TAB] together to select previous villager
With a villager selected You can move, pick up blocks, and place blocks.
  1. Left click somewhere - Move there.
  2. Left click on a block - Move and pickup that block.
  3. Right click - Drop a carried block where clicked.
  4. X - Drop a carried block immediately.
